subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: Salvador Perez, indifferent to defense as a boy, is now a Gold Glove-winning catcher for the Royals who has earned the gratitude of umpires by wearing women’s perfume for every game.
snippet: Salvador Perez, indifferent to defense as a boy, is now a Gold Glove-winning catcher for the Royals who has earned the gratitude of umpires by wearing women’s perfume for every game.
